alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 7:55PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nye and southern White Pine Counties through 815 PM PDT... At 749 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 10 to 40 miles south of Lund, moving SE at 25 mph. These storms will move over State Route 318 and may produce heavy rain resulting in ponding of water. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sunnyside and Troy Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County
